Articles.Content:
Sorry. I never use Steam.

The user below me heard of Green Iron Crown. (follow the sig if you did not)

No, just saw its posts on this forum.

The user below me isn't a dog. (just making sure. Who knows, it's the internet!)

False. Or true. You'll never know.

The user below me loves Dr. Pepper.

True! Even the diet version is good.

The user below me has worn a kilt at some point.

No... Not yet.

The user below me is guilty for the loss of one of their kerbals.

Maybe... looks guilty.

The user below me has landed on Vall?

True.

The user below me is secretly superman.

Nope. Even if I want his powers.

The use below me has punched someone in the guts.

Nope. Even if I want his powers.

The use below me has punched someone in the guts.

Yup, and I would do it again given half a chance.

The user below me lives in London, UK.

I live in Hong Kong.......sorry.

The user below me has wanted to kill Tylo.

False. Just Eve! xD

The user below me manually killed more than 100 flies.

The user below me manually killed more than 100 flies.

I kill 'em with ma pinkie.

The user below me eats fly pie.

False. I'm eating a Big Mac (seriously).

False 8-(

Nope.

The user below me can solve the fermi paradox.

Obivouly. Maybe. At some time.

*Googles*

Ah yes. Of course.

The user below me is a cat.

Shhhhh.

The user below me is NOT a cat.

How did you know?

The user below me is a fish.

Erm, no.

The user below participates in challenges.

NEIN.

the user below me likes tylo.

Never landed on it, sorry. On the other hand, it's pretty sad.

The user below me can't figure out how to build aircraft.

False. I have made spaceplanes before, but I prefer rocket crafts and rovers.

false, cat count is 0

The person below me has not seen the GIC, RIC fight, (or know the acronyms )
true, the person below mean has had a Kerbin/Earth orbiting space station last for over ten Kerbal years.
